title: Bug 27869 - StyledText overuse of Font.getFontData
description: Bug 27869 - The StyledText widget in the Red Hat 8 operating system is overusing the Font.getFontData API. Additionally, the StyledText widget is heavily utilizing the FontMetrics API. It is suggested that the metric information should be cached in the StyledText widget and updated only when the font is changed.
OB: The current implementation of the StyledText widget in Red Hat 8 excessively employs the Font.getFontData API and heavily relies on the FontMetrics API.
EB: It is believed, and many people agree, that the StyledText widget should not utilize the Font.getFontData API when text is being typed.
SR: To optimize the performance of the StyledText widget, the metric information should be cached within the widget and updated only when necessary, specifically when the font is changed.
